original: intros. intros [H_group [H_assoc [H_neutral H_opposite]]] y z Hgy Hgz x Hgx. unfold is_group in H_group. destruct H_group as [Hintern [Hassociativity [Hneutral Hopposite]]]. symmetry in Hneutral. assert (Hproperties: intern S G Add /\ associativity S Add /\ neutral S G Add O /\ opposite S G Add O Opp). { auto. } unfold intern, associativity, neutral, opposite in Hproperties. destruct Hproperties as [Hintern' [Hassociativity' [Hneutral' Hopposite']]]. rewrite Hneutral' in Hneutral. unfold opposite in Hopposite. specialize (H_opposite x Hgx). specialize (H_opposite y Hgy). specialize (H_opposite z Hgz). intros H. rewrite <- H, Hopposite, Hopposite in H. symmetry. apply H.
